verses.verse: Moab<WH4124> rebelled<WH6586> against Israel<WH3478> after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Ahab.<WH256>

Ahaziah<WH274> fell down<WH5307> through the lattice<WH7639> in his upper room<WH5944> that was in Samaria,<WH8111> and was sick.<WH2470> So he sent<WH7971> messengers,<WH4397> and said<WH559> to them,<WH3212> "Go, inquire<WH1875> of Baal Zebub,<WH1176> the god<WH430> of Ekron,<WH6138> whether I will recover<WH2421> of this sickness.<WH2483>"

But the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH1696> to Elijah<WH452> the Tishbite,<WH8664> "Arise,<WH6965> go up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> the messengers<WH4397> of the king<WH4428> of Samaria,<WH8111> and tell<WH1696> them,<WH430> 'Is it because there is no God in Israel,<WH3478> that you go<WH1980> to inquire<WH1875> of Baal Zebub,<WH1176> the god<WH1980> of Ekron?<WH6138>

Now therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "You shall not come down<WH3381> from the bed<WH4296> where you have gone up,<WH5927> but shall surely<WH4191> die.<WH4191>"'" Elijah<WH452> departed.<WH3212>
The messengers<WH4397> returned<WH7725> to him,<WH559> and he said to them,<WH2088> "Why is it that you have returned?<WH7725>"

They said<WH559> to him,<WH376> "A man came<WH5927> up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> us,<WH559> and said to us,<WH3212> 'Go, return<WH7725> to the king<WH4428> who sent<WH7971> you,<WH1696> and tell him,<WH1696> "Thus says Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH430> 'Is it because there is no God in Israel,<WH3478> that you send<WH7971> to inquire<WH1875> of Baal Zebub,<WH1176> the god<WH430> of Ekron?<WH6138> Therefore you shall not come down<WH3381> from the bed<WH4296> where you have gone up,<WH5927> but shall surely<WH4191> die.<WH4191>'"'"
He said<WH1696> to them,<WH4941> "What kind of man<WH376> was he who came up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> you,<WH1696> and told you these words?<WH1697>"
They answered<WH559> him,<WH8181> "He was a hairy man,<WH1167> and wearing<WH247> a leather<WH5785> belt<WH232> around his waist.<WH4975>" He said,<WH559> "It is Elijah<WH452> the Tishbite.<WH8664>"

Then the king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> a captain<WH8269> of fifty<WH2572> with his fifty<WH2572> to him.<WH5927> He went up to him;<WH3427> and behold, he was sitting on the top<WH7218> of the hill.<WH2022> He said<WH1696> to him,<WH376> "Man of God,<WH430> the king<WH4428> has said,<WH1696> <WH3381> 'Come down!'"

Elijah<WH452> answered<WH6030> to<WH1696> the captain<WH8269> of fifty,<WH2572> "If I am a man<WH376> of God,<WH430> let fire<WH784> come down<WH3381> from the sky,<WH8064> and consume<WH398> you and your fifty!<WH2572>" Fire<WH784> came down<WH3381> from the sky,<WH8064> and consumed<WH398> him and his fifty.<WH2572>

Again<WH7725> he sent<WH7971> to him another<WH312> captain<WH8269> of fifty<WH2572> and his fifty.<WH2572> He answered<WH6030> him,<WH1696> "Man<WH376> of God,<WH430> the king<WH4428> has said,<WH6030> <WH3381> 'Come down quickly!<WH4120>'"

Elijah<WH452> answered<WH6030> them,<WH1696> "If I am a man<WH376> of God,<WH430> let fire<WH784> come down<WH3381> from the sky,<WH8064> and consume<WH398> you and your fifty!<WH2572>" The fire<WH784> of God<WH430> came down<WH3381> from the sky,<WH8064> and consumed<WH398> him and his fifty.<WH2572>

Again<WH7725> he sent<WH7971> the captain<WH8269> of a third<WH7992> fifty<WH2572> with his fifty.<WH2572> The third<WH7992> captain<WH8269> of fifty<WH2572> went up,<WH5927> and came<WH935> and fell<WH3766> on his knees<WH1290> before<WH5048> Elijah,<WH452> and begged<WH2603> him,<WH1696> and said to him,<WH376> "Man of God,<WH430> please let my life,<WH5315> and the life<WH5315> of these fifty<WH2572> your servants,<WH5650> be precious<WH3365> in your sight.<WH5869>

Behold,<WH784> fire came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the sky,<WH8064> and consumed<WH398> the two<WH8147> former<WH7223> captains<WH8269> of fifty<WH2572> with their fifties.<WH2572> But now let my life<WH5315> be precious<WH3365> in your sight.<WH5869>"

The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH1696> to Elijah,<WH452> "Go down<WH3381> with him.<WH3372> Don't be afraid of him.<WH6440>" He arose,<WH6965> and went down<WH3381> with him to the king.<WH4428>

He said<WH1696> to him,<WH1696> "Thus says Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH7971> 'Because you have sent messengers<WH4397> to inquire<WH1875> of Baal Zebub,<WH1176> the god<WH430> of Ekron,<WH6138> is it because there is no God<WH430> in Israel<WH3478> to inquire<WH1875> of his word?<WH1697> Therefore you shall not come down<WH3381> from the bed<WH4296> where you have gone up,<WH5927> but shall surely<WH4191> die.<WH4191>'"

So he died<WH4191> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> which Elijah<WH452> had spoken.<WH1696> Jehoram<WH3088> began to reign<WH4427> in his place in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Jehoram<WH3088> the son<WH1121> of Jehoshaphat<WH3092> king<WH4428> of Judah;<WH3063> because he had no son.<WH1121>
Now the rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Ahaziah<WH274> which he did,<WH6213> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel?<WH3478>
